page.title: 04ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In our area there are quite a lot of things to do.For instance at 'Christ the King church there are Cubs,Scouts,Brownies,Guides and there is a youth club as well.At the Village Hall there are quite a few disco's now and then,and a Judo Club.We sometimes have fayres there as well.There is one Boys Club (just along the road from the Post Office) but really anybody can go there if they want to.There is a Bingo down the road from the Working Mens Club.Birthday disco's are held at the Chapel and at the Village Hall.Other activities go on at the Village Hall such as Dancing Classes in those classes they do Ballet,Tap and Ballroom Dancing for the older ones.In the Summer Holidays there is a Play Scheme in which you do lots of different activities.
